20 January, Saturday
  • Clock newsThe Ukrainian authorities described their counter-approval as “successful”
  • News
  • Exclusive

    • American legislators called US nuclear weapons obsolete.
    • Israel began intensive urban shelling in the West Bank of Jordan
    • Strategic bomber B-21 Raider conducted a second test flight
    • Minister of Defence of France: The country cannot prohibit citizens from fighting in Ukraine
    • Cota Twix, thrown out of the train, found dead.

    World

    News
    13:25Armenia and Azerbaijan demanded no territorial claims

    Baku and Yerevan require mutual assurance that they have no mutual territorial claims, the Prime Minister of Armenia, Nicole Pashinyan, stated at a meeting with the assets of the ruling party of the Civil Treaty.

    12:52Georgia encouraged the United States to address the financing of “religious intolerance”

    The President of the Parliament of Georgia, Shalva Pashvili, proposed to the USAID International Development Agency that the funding of organizations in Georgia that incite religious intolerance be transferred to the correspondents of the GLAD newspaper in Tbilisi.

    12:15The Georgian cheerleaders decided to boycott the Telawi club because of the appointment of a Russian coach.

    The Georgian football club of the Talavi high leagues report on social media that they intend to boycott the games of this team after the appointment of the chief coach of the Russian specialist Oleg Vasilenko, sends the correspondent of the GLAD newspaper to Tbilisi.

    12:11Media: In the bombing of Damascus, a member of IRR of Iran died

    A member of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps died as a result of the Israeli attack on Damascus, refers to the Reuters Agency, referring to the source of the regional Zairian association.

    11:24Syrian media reported that Israel could have attacked a house in Damascus

    Israel may have attacked a residential house in the Syrian capital, reporting to the SANA State Agency.

    11:16The Ukrainian authorities described their counter-approval as “successful”

    The head of the Office of the President of Ukraine, Andrei Hermak, believes that the SSA conducted a " successful " counter-offence in 2023, taking into account the opportunities of Kiev. He said that in an interview with the Spanish newspaper El Mundo.

    10:42There was a fire in the residence of the Greek Prime Minister

    The fire occurred at the residence of the Prime Minister of Greece, the Palace of Maxim, the building suffered minor damage, and the Greek Ministry of Climate Crisis and Civil Protection reported.

    09:45The Russian Ambassador promised a response to the possible deployment of the United States military in Denmark.

    Moscow will define military and technical measures in response to the possible deployment of United States military personnel in Denmark following the assessment of all threats, said in an interview the Ambassador of Russia to Copenhagen, Vladimir Barbin.

    09:18In Britain, it was proposed to transfer confiscated migrant boats to Kiev

    The British MissionUkraine, assisting Ukraine, offered to hand over to Kiev air boats where migrants float La Mansh, reported the Telegraph.

    08:50The damage to critical infrastructure was reported in Kyiv-controlled parts of Kherson province

    The site of the critical infrastructure in the Kyiv-controlled part of the Kherson region was damaged by explosions, informed Alexander Prokudin, head of the Ukrainian-appointed regional military administration.

    07:22Strategic bomber B-21 Raider conducted a second test flight

    The U.S. Air Force conducted the second test flight of the sixth-generation strategic stratus B-21 Raider, reported by the United States Air Force Representative Ann Stefanek.

    07:17Bayden's assistants said that Kiev would lose without the US in a few weeks.

    In the event that the U.S. Congress does not approve Kyiv ' s aid, Ukraine will lose its conflict with Russia in a few weeks, the Assistant President Joe Baden of the United States said.

    06:38Russia has become the largest oil supplier in China

    Russia has become the largest oil supplier to the People ' s Republic of China and has reported to the Customs office of the CPD.

    05:24Senator Scott, among the Republicans, supported the movement of the Trumpa.

    The senator from South Caroline Tim Scott, who had applied until November 2023 for the nomination of the President of the United States of America from the Republican Party, expressed support for Donald Tramp.

    04:47Israel began intensive urban shelling in the West Bank of Jordan

    The Israeli army storms the towns in the West Bank of the Jordan River and enters into clashes with the resistance forces.

    04:35The British army can be reduced by one third in 10 years

    The British Forces may be reduced by almost one third over the next 10 years, such estimates are provided by The Times.

    04:10The President of Venezuela accused the ultra-right opposition of preparing the state of affairs.

    The President of Venezuela, Nicholas Maduro, accused the ultra-right opposition to terrorism and the preparation of a coup d ' état in the run-up to the presidential elections scheduled for the second half of this year.

    03:55At the dormitory in China, 13 people died because of the fire.

    At least 13 people were victims of a residential fire in the Chinese province of Hanan.

    03:42American legislators called US nuclear weapons obsolete.

    U.S. nuclear weapons are outdated, and the Chairman of the committee of the Armed Forces House, Roger Wheeler, and Senator Debra Fisher.

    03:25Euros can supply Ukraine up to 1.5 million shells by spring

    By the end of April, European Unions would be able to provide a million rounds for Ukraine, declared by the Eurocommissioner on the Internal Market and Defence Industry, Thierry Breton.

    The people of NATO learn to think about war with Russia

    The NATO Chief of Military Committee Rob Bauer stated that the Russian Federation ' s conflict and alliance could take place for 20 years. At the same time, in Germany, the panic surrounding the confrontation with Moscow continues to rise and is expected to be in conflict in five to seven years. Similar statements are also made from Poland, Sweden and a number of other countries. What is the reason for this alarmism and how does Moscow react?

    How many people will be forced to protect the Greens.

    The Kiev regime is desperately looking for all new men to fill the Ukrainian army. Laws are tightened, mobilization is increasing. How many people are still in the hands of the Greens to put holes on the front? Strictly speaking, it is a military secret, but some calculations can still be made. And the final figure of Zelensky is unlikely to be happy.

    Iran was in the ring of war

    Just a few days Iran targeted three States immediately. These are Syria, Iraq and Pakistan. Shells also came back, but only from Pakistan. What are the reasons for this escalation, what are the motives behind Iran ' s military and political leadership and how can such developments affect Russia ' s interests in the region?

    Green noted in Davos a scandal and requests

    Ukraine has become one of the main themes of the Davos Economic Forum. The leader of the Kiev regime, Vladimir Zelensky, came personally to the forum. What exactly did he want to do with what he did and failed, and why did the affair around a possible meeting between Zelena and the Chinese representatives turn into a scandal?

    Views
    Gevorg Mirzayan
    In Iowa, Trump, Ramaswamy and Russia won

    Trump, unlike Hayley and Byden, is not sick either of globalism or of cowardophobia. Once he came to power, there would be a diplomatic window for the end of the Ukrainian war on Russian (i.e., the applicable) conditions. Moscow and Washington could at least try to agree on something.

    5 comments
    Timofei Bordachev
    Davos is entertainment and war in one package.

    The United States and Europe are rapidly building all their available tools to protect their own special positions in world affairs. Davos ' military function becomes as important as traditional entertainment and commercial.

    7 comments
    Natalia Potemkin
    Politicians lie like eyewitnesses.

    With regard to the fact that the United States has a myth about the scary and terrible Russia, many think that this is the sole responsibility of the American media. Alas, in the competition, who will tell the worst story of Russia, they will always be second place after so-called eyewitnesses.

    25 comments
    Sergei Mirkin
    The British candy won't make the life of the Green Large.

    While neither the United States nor the EU have allocated money to Ukraine, the signing of an agreement with Britain in Kiev publicly declares a geopolitical victory. In fact, this document is the EU decision to start negotiations with Ukraine on joining the Union.

    7 comments
    Kiril Averyanov
    The United States is threatening a new Balkan bomb.

    In the Western Balkans there was another geopolitical fracture: Moscow supports the Serbs, the West condones chauvinism. The conflict between the Republika Srpska and the Bosnian authorities is far from a hot phase. On 8 January, two F-16 fighters from the United States Air Force flew over Bosnia in anticipation of the celebrations in the Serbian Entite of the Day of the Republic.

    5 comments
    Gevorg Mirzayan
    Green doesn't want to die.

    If the Zelensky remains in power in conflict with all (as is currently the case), the relationship between the West and Ukraine will be further eroded, and Europe and even the United States will continue to dig the fatigue of the Kiev regime. Which means it'll be faster to win the SVR.

    19 comments
    18 January 2024

    Russian liberals fleeing to the West were frightened by Estonian intelligence

    Estonia claims the capture of another " Russian spy " , which has now been exposed by a local university professor. Who is the subject and why is the detention of a former scientific officer now a blow not by Russian intelligence, but by Russian-successed liberals who escaped from Russia?

    Details...
    • 20 comments
    17 January 2024

    Macron will supply Ukraine with a new type of weapon.

    Green will receive a new type of air bomb from France, because the West cannot " let Russia win " . This was one of the main outcomes of the very aggressive speech of French leader Emmanuel Macron. The President of France responded to his remarks immediately, including by the Russian Armed Forces.

    Details...
    • 52 commentary
    17 January 2024

    The Baltic Business Prohibits Trade with Russia

    A vigorous campaign of deleting any form of trade cooperation with Russia is being conducted in Latvia. Special blacklists are being developed for those entrepreneurs who continue to operate with our country. However, despite everything, statistics show that local businessmen are interested in mutual trade. This is a very clear sign of the failure of the information war being waged by the Pristina against Russia.

    Details...
    • 13 comments
    16 January 2024

    Iran ' s revenge on Iraq

    Iran has carried out 24 attacks on sites in Iraq and Syria that connect with the United States and Israel. Tehran ' s objectives have been to places where the attacks against the Islamic Republic were allegedly prepared. While this has led to a complication of relations with Iraq, Tehran and Baghdad have a common challenge, a reduction in United States influence in the region.

    Details...
    • 6 comments
    15 January 2024

    The French were not allowed to overthrow the Russian African friend.

    The attempted coup d ' état took place in a friendly Russian-speaking African country, Burkina Faso. The victim of the assassination attempt was to be the leader of the country, Commander Ibrahim Traoré of the army. Local sources link the successful prevention of attempted coups with Russian specialists.

    Details...
    • 22 comments
    15 January 2024

    Why is Berlin scaring German wars with Russia

    Germany has published a plan of the bundeswer to prepare for the conflict between Russia and NATO. In the local press, the threat of such a war was termed " immutable " , and the Ministry of Defence failed to refute leaks in the media. What are the features of this plan and why are such information made public now?

    Details...
    • 11 comments
    15 January 2024

    Ukraine has brought U.S. policy to the step

    “If a new budget for Ukraine is not adopted, Ukraine is likely to suffer military defeat for several months.” In this way, the politicians explain the extremely harsh remarks made by the President of the United States against American parliamentarians. What exactly did Joseph Byden say and why his political opponents refused to give money to Ukraine?

    Details...
    • 11 comments
    15 January 2024

    Bulgaria refers to greater love for Hitler than for Russia.

    According to the Minister of Defence of Bulgaria, Bulgarian schoolchildren are misled by the fact that " Russia is our friend and liberator, and we must be internally grateful to her " . “In history, we have often appeared on the opposite sides of different conflicts”, is said by Todor Tagarev. If his implication is interpreted literally, it is a direct appreciation of Bulgaria ' s cooperation with Nazi Germany.

    Details...
    • 42 comments
    14 January 2024

    Ukraine's name is fighting for Britain.

    The full text of the agreement concluded between Ukraine and the United Kingdom had been published, and in Kiev it was already referred to as “ethnic”. It is stated that the United Kingdom provides Ukraine with a range of security assurances that are actually identical to what might give NATO membership. Is that so, and what does this document mean in reality?

    Details...
    • 20 comments
    13 January 2024

    Why Gonzalo Lira was dangerous to the United States.

    An American journalist, Gonzalo Lira, who criticized the Green and United States for the unleashing of the Ukrainian conflict, died in the Harikov hospital. For eight months, the journalist was in detention where he was tortured without adequate medical assistance. The letters of Lira's relatives to United States diplomats have never been brought to bear. Why did the United States treat Lira as a citizen of Class II and what could be the consequences?

    Details...
    • 24 comments
    12 January 2024

    The new Government of Poland went against God.

    Poland is being stripped of one of the most fundamental staples, which has recently been completely inexorable to that country -- faith in God. The new Government of the Polish Republic has begun to contribute to the destruction of religion. According to leading Polish politicians, there is a " moral revolution that destroys traditions " . What happened to the Poles?

    Details...
    • 89 comments
    12 January 2024

    Azerbaijan is beginning to review Armenian borders

    For the first time, the President of Azerbaijan, Ilham Aliyev, has made actual and positive demands on how the borders of neighbouring Armenia should be established. And that's not the boundaries that emerged after the collapse of the USSR. What is it about and how did Pashinian put himself in this corner?

    Details...
    • 104 commentary
    12 January 2024

    In the Middle East, the United States has set fire to a new military conflict

    U.S. and Britain launched mass aircraft at Husit sites in Yemen. The attack has already triggered a turbulent response in both the world community and the States. Artists in response threatened Washington and London with serious consequences. Why would Baden have another conflict in the Middle East and what would the escalation turn out for the whole region?

    Details...
    • 12 comments
    11 January 2024

    Russia is creating a new area of pressure on Georgia and Turkey in the Black Sea.

    Abkhaziya confirmed plans to restore the Russian naval base on its coast. Why the need for this has arisen now and what is the importance of a new ship-based location The Black Sea fleet will have strategic objectives in our country in the region?

    Details...
    • 46 comments
    11 January 2024

    The great enemy of Russia is beginning to play with Ukraine against America.

    The so-called peace formula of the Greens is said to be discussed in the forthcoming Davos forum. The prospects for this discussion, however, are already clear. This is best illustrated by a " secret meeting " held in Riyadh in December. Why did she fail and why was one of Russia's worst enemies?

    Details...
    • 11 comments
    10 January 2024

    The U.S. withdrawal from Iraq will have global implications in favour of Russia

    Iraq is increasingly approaching the final withdrawal of United States troops on its territory. There are a number of reasons why this process is inevitable. It will bring with it fundamental developments in the Middle East. That would be a huge defeat for the United States, a victory for Iran, and would bring benefits, including Russia.

    Details...
    • 8 comments
    Next page

    Circular 2005-2024 GS, Business Gazette Watch. Write to us.information@vz.ru

    Drafting policy

    Russia has confirmed enormous ambitions on the North Sea Road

    Russia will put another new Russian nuclear ice cream on the other day. This is the third of the six planned. Without them, the North Sea Road cannot be developed. The Competitor of the Suez Canal is growing rapidly, and for the first time through transit cargo. But this year's plan is even more ambitious. Will the ILC increase the traffic more than twice?Details

    • Russia has reduced investments in United States hospitals
    • The decline in the external debt of Russia
    • The EU began discussing the 13th sanctions package against Russia
    Move to section

    The Hamma towards Trumpa will become the Green song

    " First think and then speak. " This was the response of the President of Ukraine, Vladimir Zelen Donaldu Trampe, to his proposals for a settlement of the conflict. Obviously Zelensky said that without thinking about his own fate.Details

    • Zaharova stated that the West had withdrawn from Russia ' s slogan of " strategic defeat "
    • Deputa: The idea of Orban ' s presidency in Europe did not support EU leaders
    • The White House reported new attacks on Husit sites in Yemen
    Move to section

    Ukraine has to repeat the lesson of the Pérezlav rad.

    This week marks the 370th anniversary of the Perislav Rada. As a result, some of the small lands under the control of the Zaporozka Vojska left Russia. According to historians and politicians, today Moscow is partly repeating the scenario. The reciprocity of Ukraine was necessary, but the efforts of the Ukrainians themselves were necessary for the full realization of that concept.Details

    • In Berdjansk, a Polish-Ukrainian anti-Russian propaganda centre was found
    • In Permi, the accused was arrested in double murder.
    • Mashkov: Public reception facilities throughout the country received over 12,000 communications
    Move to section

    Iran was in the ring of war

    Just a few days Iran targeted three States immediately. These are Syria, Iraq and Pakistan. Shells also came back, but only from Pakistan. What are the reasons for this escalation, what are the motives behind Iran ' s military and political leadership and how can such developments affect Russia ' s interests in the region?Details

    • Armenia and Azerbaijan demanded no territorial claims
    • Georgia encouraged the United States to address the financing of “religious intolerance”
    • The Georgian cheerleaders decided to boycott the Telawi club because of the appointment of a Russian coach.
    Move to section

    Attack by Ukraine on Belgorod was directly involved in the West

    Ukraine has committed a new act of terror against civilians, and Belgorod has been subjected to massive bombardment of cluster munitions. Fifteen people were killed, including children. In Washington, D.C. stated that they were not encouraging such attacks, but the experts pointed out that it was the United States that was directly responsible. And not just them.Details

    • Three in a week, the body was found on the beach in Turkish Antalya.
    • Animal shelter exploded in South Sahalinsk
    • The Kherson province ' s resident died as a result of the bombardment of the U.S.
    Move to section
    • Timur Sherzad
      The occupation of Novgorod demonstrated sophisticated barbarity

      Eighty years ago, 20 January 1944, Soviet troops released the Great Novgorod. The Russians entered a lost city in 1941 on the seventh day of the offensive, waiting for a sad sight.

      0 comments
    • Sergei Khudyev
      Stalin is now making a futuation.

      And the Orthodox icon and the portrait of Stalin are perceived as symbols of " non-western " as an opportunity to show the figs to the liberals and to anyone who doesn't love us. And the combination of the portrait of Stalin and the icon is a double high-powered fig.

      52 commentary
    • Gleb Kuznetsov
      The world's elites turn the truth into misinformation.

      " Information " is not misleading information, it is the dissemination of information messages or assessments that contradict the current elite agenda. Tomorrow ' s " disinformation " is now another " truth " .

      15 comments
    • Chisinau has denunciated an agreement with the CIS on cooperation in the elimination of the CC
    • The Ukrainians override the new yearly treatment of the Zelena
    • New cases have been initiated in Moscow as a result of the attack on the slave traders.
    Move to section

    • Zelensky in Davos

      Vladimir Zelensky has become the principal agent of the Davos Economic Forum: all other topics of its organizers have come to the fore. However, it had not spared him new nervous breakdowns: the Greenskie had managed to hunt the head of the Chinese delegation and Donald Trampus. What's that threatening him?

    • Macron guarantees for Ukraine

      President Emmanuel Macron of France promised " not to let Russia defeat " , announcing new military supplies to the U.S. and announced an early visit to Kiev to sign a treaty on " security assurances " for Ukraine. What kind of guarantee is that? What does Macron want and what does he get?

    • Our mission is to be for our own.

      We congratulate all permanent and random viewers on the offensive of 2024. This holiday is very different from the one that was a year ago. Russia is the same. But in the eyes of our enemies, she's changed a lot.

      Move to section

      • Russia celebrated the Creation

      • The actor Yuri Solomon died.

      • Germany has received massive protests

        Move to section

        As the popularity of Russian payment systems is growing

        The withdrawal from the Russian market of the western services providing financial services has led to the blossom of domestic payment systems (Mir banquet maps, SBP fast payment systems, and the SPF financial communications system). The explosion of their popularity is in our picture.Details

          Move to section

          • Trampu set up traps all over America.

            In the 16 states of the United States, lawsuits were filed to prevent former President Donald Trampa from participating in the Republican Party ' s primer. If these lawsuits were met, Trump would not be able to participate in the election of the head of State, but the political implications could be far more severe for all the United States.

          • Byden left Green without a Christmas present.

            The visit of the President of Ukraine to Washington, with a view to achieving the United States of America ' s next cash tranche, has ended in failure. Differences within Congress continue to prevent the adoption of a multi-million-dollar programme of assistance to Ukraine and it has already been stated that it will be " practically impossible " until Christmas.

          • Ukraine makes women its latest reserve

            Ukraine is actively discussing the use of the last mobilization reserve for women. A number of professional categories have already committed themselves to military registration regardless of gender, and there are many reports that women have actually been recruited into the Ukrainian army.

Who is the subject and why is the detention of a former scientific officer now a blow not by Russian intelligence, but by Russian-successed liberals who escaped from Russia?

This was one of the main outcomes of the very aggressive speech of French leader Emmanuel Macron. The President of France responded to his remarks immediately, including by the Russian Armed Forces.
